entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
